text: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَقۡطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُواْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأٓتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُواْ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرٗا

translation.en: And if they had been entered upon from all its [surrounding] regions and fitnah had been demanded of them, they would have done it and not hesitated over it except briefly
translation.id: Dan kalau (Yasrib) diserang dari segala penjuru, dan mereka diminta agar membuat kekacauan, niscaya mereka mengerjakannya; dan hanya sebentar saja mereka menunggu
